<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>true</before>
        <description>sys_hub_flow_base.name cannot be localized because it is type string</description>
        <name>Change flow block name to translated tex</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
    if (pm.isZboot())
        return;

	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	gr.addQuery('name', 'sys_hub_flow_block');
	gr.addQuery('element', 'name');
	gr.addQuery('internal_type', 'string');
	gr.query();

	if(gr.next()) {
		new TranslationUtils().convert("sys_hub_flow_block",["name"]);
		gs.info('sys_hub_flow_block.name internal type changed to "translated_text"');
	}
}());]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
